algorithm_technique: Greedy approach by sorting and picking the most expensive candies.
problem_summary_simple: Minimize candy buying cost by getting a free candy for every two bought.
problem_summary_technical: Greedy strategy: sort costs descending, buy two most expensive, get cheapest free. Sum costs of bought candies.
key_insights: To maximize the value of free candies, always pair the two most expensive candies.
This ensures the free candy taken is the cheapest among the remaining ones.
Sorting the costs in descending order is the first step.
